data.actual_result: Sometimes you get throwed back by 20-30 messages, forcing you to scroll up like crazy to retrieve the latest meme you were viewing
data.expected_result: You should be able to continue reading your memes without interruption
data.short_description: When you scroll up very slowly through a channel with a lot of images, sometimes you will suddenly be shooted back down by a few messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a channel with a chat history full of images (in my case a #memes channel) - Scroll up very slowly. Personnally I stop scrolling for 5 seconds per image so I have time to see/read them and laugh a bit on them (if they are dank memes) - Continue for a few minutes, you should start observing it soon after the "you are viewing older messages" appears.
